reviewText: The Hidden Keys to Loving Relationships from The Gary Smalley Seminar includes these session:  1) Recognize and value your mate's differences 50 minutes; 2) Four essential qualities every marriage needs to survive, succeed, and flourish 45 minutes; 3)  Overcoming the marjor destroyer of relationships  40 minutes; 4) Using emotional word pictures to increase intimacy and understanding  38 minutes; 5) Becomin g best friends with your family 22 minutes; 6) Freedom from negative emotions such as anger, worry and hurt feelings 30 minutes.  This is a wonderful series for any couple who are feeling a lose of intimacy or dealing with marital issues... Before you call it quits try watching these 2 VHS tapes and try to save your marriage.
